summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from September to October 2020 between personnel at the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) New York Field Office. The emails discuss the addition of a new agent to an investigative team and a request for a call to discuss questions about what happened during an investigation.

persons.name: Special Agent Jn
persons.context: A Special Agent with the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) New York Field Office, involved in email correspondence about an investigation and a new agent joining the team.

events.title: New Agent Assignment Notification
events.description: An email notifies a team that a new agent from the OIG will be replacing the sender on the investigative team.

events.title: Request for Call Regarding Investigation
events.description: An email indicates someone has questions about what happened during an investigation and requests a call to discuss.

locations: New York Field Office One Battery Park Plaza, 29th Floor, New York, NY 10004
keyFacts: The correspondence is from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office, indicating internal oversight activity.
The emails reference an ongoing investigation and a personnel change on the investigative team in September 2020.
On October 13, 2020, a request is made for a call to answer questions about what happened during the investigation, suggesting a review or follow-up.
The document shows internal DOJ OIG coordination regarding an unspecified case.
